summary: Make vim use WinXP style menu.
name: XpMenu
description:
This script and dll simulate WinXP style menu.
This module works on Win2K only.(don't support others)
You can build it with Microsoft Platform SDK.
Enjoy!

--
screenshot:
http://hp.vector.co.jp/authors/VA020411/Vim/xpmenu/screenshot.jpg
This use japanese font.
install_details:
copy xpmenu.vim to $VIMRUNTIME/plugin
copy xpmenu.dll to $VIM
